I obtain menu when I right click on June 3 ..., but I cannot rename or rename

*** Bug 16960 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 16675 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

The only reason this problem would occur is 
if 'IConfiguredSite.getInstallConfiguration' returns null. I added a check for 
null but I consider this a core bug because the contract for 
getInstallConfiguration says nothing about null being the valid return value:

	/**
	 * Returns the install configuration object this site is part of.
	 * 
	 * @return install configuration object
	 * @since 2.0
	 */
	public IInstallConfiguration getInstallConfiguration();

Fixed in the UI, moving to Core for comment.

No longer able to reproduce with Dejan's patch. Removing from F3 list, but 
keeping defect open so we can address the underlying core question.
